#* {{zh-x|民宿{siok} 佇 山區，氣溫 誠 下{kē}，窗外 夜蟲 無 睏 吼 出聲，唱{chhiùⁿ} 規暝 的 歌 予 阮 聽。|The guesthouse was in a mountain area, where the temperature was very low. The night bugs outside the window did not sleep and were chirping out loud, singing songs to me '''all night'''.|TW|ref={{lang|zh|張翠苓}}, [http://www.jen-pin.com.tw/doc/2012010210372720 {{lang|zh|歡喜佮驚惶}}]}}
#* {{zh-x|無 留 半 字{lī}，就{tiō} 斷-了 過{kòe}去，毋\不{m̄} 甘心 付出，為 伊 吼\哮 '''@歸暝{mî}'''。|He did not leave half a word and just ended the past. I am not willing to pay the price and '''cry''' all night because of him.|TW|ref={{w2|zh|黃乙玲}}, {{lang|zh|無字的情批}}}}
